content: स्नेहः [स्निह्-घञ्] {@--1@} Affection, love, kindness, tenderness; स्नेहदाक्षिण्ययोर्योगात् कामीव प्रतिभाति मे <ls>V. 2. 4</ls> (where it has sense 6 also); अस्ति मे सोदरस्नेहोप्येतेषु <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Oiliness, viscidity, unctuousness, lubricity (one of the 24 Guṇas according to the Vaiśeṣikas). {@--3@} Moisture. {@--4@} Grease, fat, any unctuous substance. {@--5@} Oil; निर्विष्टविषयस्नेहः स दशांतमुपेयिवान् <ls>R. 12. 1</ls>, <ls>Pt. 1. 82</ls> (where the word has sense 1 also), <ls n="Pt. 1.">221</ls>; <ls>R. 4. 75.</ls> {@--6@} Any fluid of the body, such as semen.
